version_description:
Hyvää päivää! That's "good day" in Finnish and just one of the thousands of words and phrases you can learn with the latest addition to the Drops family of languages.

Finnish is the 35th language offered in Drops, coming after Samoan, Greek and Maori released earlier this year.


Γεια! (Hey!)
Also Drops is excited to announce the latest addition to our family of languages--Greek.
You can now play your way to learning the Greek language in our latest update.

With this update, you can learn the words and phrases you'll need to know to navigate your way around places that speak a language different from your own as a part of our new Travel Talk category. You'll get eleven new topics with more than 200 useful words and phrases so that wherever your next travels take you, Drops can help you prepare in fun, 5-minute learning sessions.

Γεια! (Hey!)
Drops is excited to announce the latest addition to our family of languages--Greek.
You can now play your way to learning the Greek language in our latest update.
Wordbank has a fresh, new look! Download this update for a better experience using the Drops Wordbank and to access the new search feature.
We've been hard at work improving the stability and quality of Drops.
Learning Korean? Drops has two new topics you’ll love. You can now learn K-Pop words and native Korean numbers!

With this update, you can learn the words and phrases you'll need to know to navigate your way around places that speak a language different from your own as a part of our new Travel Talk category. You'll get eleven new topics with more than 200 useful words and phrases so that wherever your next travels take you, Drops can help you prepare in fun, 5-minute learning sessions.
Learning Korean? Drops has two new topics you’ll love. You can now learn K-Pop words and native Korean numbers!

We’ve added a new language—you can now learn Maori with Drops!

Streaks has a brand new look. Complete a session each day to keep up your study streak, and get rewarded.

You can now seamlessly change your learning settings without leaving your active Drops session with this latest update.

And feedback is very important to us, that’s why we’ve added a new content reporting feature. If you notice an error or bug in the app, you can report it where you see it!
We've been hard at work improving the stability and quality of Drops.
Made the Hebrew and Korean romanization a lot better!:)

24.3:
With this update we polished a few rough edges:
- added romanization for Cantonese
- Apple Watch app language icon fix

24.1:
Minor bug fixes for AR

24.0:
ARRRR! Practice your new words in Augmented Reality and redefine how fun learning can be! (available on ARkit enabled devices: iPhone 6S and above, 2017 iPad, etc)
Fancy some new dialects? We are introducing 4 new options:
+ Cantonese Chinese
+ Latin-American Spanish
+ European Portuguese
+ British English

Of course Drops is now optimized for iPhone X too and we made an important tweak on our Apple Watch app too!

22.3:
Improved alphabet learning experience - let us know what you think!

22.0:
Brand new Dojo algorithm & tons of fixes for you to enjoy!

21.0:
The show goes on: 2 brand new languages! Welcome Indonesian and Dutch!
Our Japanese offering is boosted with dedicated Katakana topic, the Chinese now teaches the 100 most fundamental radicals and Hindi also got it’s well deserved alphabet topic!
+ various other tidbits:
- Apple Watch app also got some new powers
- fixed ton of old dusty bugs :)

You asked for it and we deliver! Now you can learn Thai in Drops! Yes, you read that right! One of our most requested languages is now ready at your fingertips! Enjoy :)
You asked for it and we deliver! Now you can learn Thai in Drops! Yes, you read that right! One of our most requested languages is now ready at your fingertips! Enjoy :)

So the good news are:
-We completely rewrote our codebase from scratch (This means no more old and annoying bugs, but increased performance + dramatically decreased battery consumption)
-Now you can choose the time when you will receive notifications from the app
-Also, you can now use google for synching your app progress
That's it! We only have good news! Cool, right?! So what are you waiting for? Let's learn some new languages!
(And if you see any issues, please don't hesitate to contact us at support@languagedrops.com)

We hope this update helps resolve all purchase & restore purchase related issues!

So the good news are:
- We completely rewrote our codebase from scratch (This means no more old and annoying bugs, but increased performance + dramatically decreased battery consumption)
- Now you can choose the time when you will receive notifications
- Login with Google to sync your progress
- Enjoy the greatly improved Though Word Dojo algorithm

(And if you see any issues, please don't hesitate to contact us at support@languagedrops.com)
Hey! Heeey! Look here! We have new stuff! Soooo... Not only did we fix a whole bunch of issues but we also added Polish language! Wooohoo! Jeden, dwa, trzy... go, go, gooo~  Happy learning^^

CRAZY NEWS ALERT! We added the Polish language! Now you can choose from 30 different language options! Wooohooo!
Aaaaaand….Drum roll, please! Character learning in Drops! Japanese, Chinese, Korean…and the list goes on! Learn characters by drawing, tapping, swiping. Sounds super fun, right?! So… what are you waiting for?! Give it a try! Happy learning^^

人? 口? 女? 心? That's all Chinese for me… Oh you don't understand them either? Let's learn to draw Chinese characters in Drops then!
人? 口? 女? 心? That's all Chinese for me… Oh you don't understand them either? Let's learn to draw Chinese characters in Drops then!

The good: We added a male/female switch to Hebrew.
The cool: You can learn to draw Chinese characters with our new feature!
The pretty: Tablet users, get your party hats on! Drops is now optimized for your screens. That means it's time to get busy with your immersive, visual learning.

Aloha! We're excited to welcome our newest addition - Hawaiian! Not only can you learn all the essentials of this beautiful language, but for the first time, you can learn local, Hawaiian-specific words like our personal favorite humuhumunukunukuāpua'a, too. What’s yours?

But that's not all that you're getting in this update. We also reorganized the topic screen to make it easier to navigate through the list of topics and choose what you want to learn! Enjoy

Aloha! We're excited to welcome our newest addition - Hawaiian! Not only can you learn all the essentials of this beautiful language, but for the first time, you can learn local, Hawaiian-specific words like our personal favorite humuhumunukunukuāpua'a, too. What’s yours?

But that's not all that you're getting in this update. We also reorganized the topic screen to make it easier to navigate through the list of topics and choose what you want to learn! Enjoy

Aloha! We're excited to welcome our newest addition - Hawaiian! Not only can you learn all the essentials of this beautiful language, but for the first time, you can learn local, Hawaiian-specific words like our personal favorite humuhumunukunukuāpua'a, too. What’s yours?

But that's not all that you're getting in this update. We also reorganized the topic screen to make it easier to navigate through the list of topics and choose what you want to learn! Enjoy

Looking for even more great material to learn in your new language? How does 30% more sound? We've added more than 800 new words, so now you can talk about your daily routines, relationships, and hobbies in more detail, and even learn a bit of etiquette. Curious to know what else is new? Be sure to update!

We've also added email login, so it's easier than ever to save your learning data in Drops.

And... just in case you missed it, we have a new language. Learn Hawaiian with Drops.

Setting new goals? Looking for a challenge? Finding motivation in seeing your progress? Download our latest update to start tracking your learning in Drops.
Setting new goals? Looking for a challenge? Finding motivation in seeing your progress? Download our latest update to start tracking your learning in Drops.

Our new milestones are great motivation, but now you get even more insight into your learning progress. Would you like to see exactly where you are in each topic you're learning? The two new progress bars let you see how many words you've met and how many you've already mastered in each topic!

Our new milestones are great motivation, but now you get even more insight into your learning progress. Would you like to see exactly where you are in each topic you're learning? The two new progress bars let you see how many words you've met and how many you've already mastered in each topic!

Plus, you've asked, we've added. Drops now offers progress reset. If you'd like to start a topic over, you can do so with a simple tap of a button.

Your learning experience is now more customizable than ever. You can hide and unhide words from within the wordbank to quickly and easily choose the words you learn in Drops and tailor your learning experience.

Your learning experience is now more customizable than ever. You can hide and unhide words from within the wordbank to quickly and easily choose the words you learn in Drops and tailor your learning experience.

You can now seamlessly change your learning settings without leaving your active Drops session with this latest update.

And feedback is very important to us, that’s why we’ve added a new content reporting feature. If you notice an error or bug in the app, you can report it where you see it!

At Drops, our goal is to provide you with the most accurate translations possible—that’s why we are adding a content reporting button. If you find broken content, you can send our content team a report directly.

At Drops, our goal is to provide you with the most accurate translations possible—that’s why we are adding a content reporting button. If you find broken content, you can send our content team a report directly.
This update offers a new way to practice! Introducing Listening Tests, a new way to play with your words and improve your listening comprehension.

Good things come in threes...

This update offers a new way to practice! Introducing Listening Tests, a new way to play with your words and improve your listening comprehension.

Want even more effective ways to boost your language skills? The Word Dojo now features an improved SRS algorithm. You get to review words at the just the right moment so they stick.

What else is new? We added our 33rd language! You can now learn Samoan with Drops.

Good things come in threes...

With this update, you can learn the words and phrases you'll need to know to navigate your way around places that speak a language different from your own as a part of our new Travel Talk category. You'll get eleven new topics with more than 200 useful words and phrases so that wherever your next travels take you, Drops can help you prepare in fun, 5-minute learning sessions.

With this update, you can learn the words and phrases you'll need to know to navigate your way around places that speak a language different from your own as a part of our new Travel Talk category. Japanese and Korean have hundreds of new words! We’ve expanded the languages to include language-specific content. You can now learn the names of iconic dishes from Japan or Korea, onomatopoeic expressions, and other vocabulary related to Korean culture and Japanese culture.
